task.title: How to download the FieldWorks Test Manual

prerequisites.p: Before you can dowload or upgrade this manual, you will need to:

ul.li: Realize, the download will take a couple of minutes using a 56K modem with no competing traffic.

steps.p: Here are the steps to download an appliction from the SIL Intranet:
steps.step:
Locate or create a directory to recieve the test manual.
The download is a "chm" file, so provide a permanent location such as the folder you use to store your test reports.
Start your browser and enter this universal resource locator (url), http://intranet.sil.org/softwaredev/test/index.html in its address box then press the <Enter> key or click
Click the "Test Manual Download" link from the home page.
A dialog asks whether to run from the website or copy to your disk. Click "copy to disk".
Another dialog askes you to choose a folder on your system to put the file in. Choose the folder you selected in step 1.
Double click the "chm" file to launch the test manual.
